result.title: Project Handbook and Quality Plan
result.description: Project Handbook and Quality Plan (R, PU, M2) contains general operational information including contact details, reporting processes, communication protocols, document templates and numbering methods, logos et cetera. Quality plan elements include information about technical quality control, risk logs and the procedures for risk monitoring, decision-making and conflict resolution.

result.title: Basic framework to enable asset transform
result.description: Basic framework to enable asset transform (DEM, PU, M18) • A framework for describing arbitrary sets of transformations. • A set of tools that can perform the transformations, and advertise their capabilities to a search engine and asset management system. • Methods for indicating/specifying properties to drive the transformation and measure appropriateness.

result.title: Initial visual and textual dataset creation and legal and ethical requirements
result.description: This deliverable will describe the creation of the multimedia and multilingual datasets for the use cases. Furthermore, the deliverable will contain a comprehensive description of the legal and ethical requirements. The deliverable will also cooperate and contribute to D3.1 with textual data coming from freely available content from open web resources or proprietary data collections from v4Design data providers accompanying visual content.

result.title: Technical requirements and architecture
result.description: This deliverable details the technical requirements that will be taken into account during the implementation of the V4Design platform. In addition, it describes the functionalities that will be supported by the platform. Finally, it outlines the system architecture that will be used for the implementation of the platform prototypes.
